name: bitwig-websocket-rpc
description: JSON-RPC 2.0 implementation over WebSockets for Bitwig Studio.

scripts.dev:build:api-8: cd mvn && mvn -P development,extension-api-8 clean package
scripts.dev:build:api-9: cd mvn && mvn -P development,extension-api-9 clean package
scripts.dev:build:api-10: cd mvn && mvn -P development,extension-api-10 clean package
scripts.dev:build:api-11: cd mvn && mvn -P development,extension-api-11 clean package
scripts.dev:build:api-12: cd mvn && mvn -P development,extension-api-12 clean package
scripts.prod:build:api-8: cd mvn && mvn -P production,extension-api-8 clean package
scripts.prod:build:api-9: cd mvn && mvn -P production,extension-api-9 clean package
scripts.prod:build:api-10: cd mvn && mvn -P production,extension-api-10 clean package
scripts.prod:build:api-11: cd mvn && mvn -P production,extension-api-11 clean package
scripts.prod:build:api-12: cd mvn && mvn -P production,extension-api-12 clean package
scripts.test:build:browser: mkdir -p test/build && browserify -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" test/test-suite.coffee > test/build/test-suite.js
